uha hara mahīnē kōśiśa kara rihā hai
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਮਹੀਨੇ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
He has been trying for each month
He has been trying for a good week
uha cagē haphatē tōṁ kōśiśa kara rihā hai
ਉਹ ਚੰਗੇ ਹਫਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
He has been trying for a good week
He has been trying for the first week
uha pahilē hafatē tōṁ kōśiśa kara rihā hai
ਉਹ ਪਹਿਲੇ ਹਫ਼ਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
He has been trying for the first week
He has been trying for a many a week
uha ika haphatē tōṁ bahuta kōśiśa kara rihā sī
ਉਹ ਇੱਕ ਹਫਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਬਹੁਤ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He has been trying for a many a week
He has been trying for each week
uha hara hafatē kōśiśa kara rihā hai
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਹਫ਼ਤੇ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
He has been trying for each week
He has been leaving a good business
uha cagā kārōbāra chaḍa rihā hai
ਉਹ ਚੰਗਾ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰ ਛੱਡ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
He has been leaving a good business
He has been leaving each business
uha harēka kārōbāra nū chaḍa rihā hai
ਉਹ ਹਰੇਕ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰ ਨੂੰ ਛੱਡ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
He has been leaving each business
He has been calling the first mother
uha pahilī māṁ nū bulā'undā rihā hai
ਉਹ ਪਹਿਲੀ ਮਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾਉਂਦਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
He has been calling the first mother
He has been calling his many mothers
uha āpaṇī'āṁ bahuta sārī'āṁ māvāṁ nū bulā'undā rihā hai
ਉਹ ਆਪਣੀਆਂ ਬਹੁਤ ਸਾਰੀਆਂ ਮਾਵਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾਉਂਦਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
He has been calling his many mothers
He has been calling each mother
uha hara māṁ nū bulā'undā rihā hai
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਮਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾਉਂਦਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
He has been calling each mother
